details.group_dynamic_select: SELECT distinct(system.id) FROM system WHERE (system.os_family = 'Windows XP' OR system.os_family = 'Windows Vista' OR system.os_family = 'Windows 7' OR system.os_family = 'Windows 8' OR system.os_family = 'Windows 10') AND system.status = 'production'
details.group_description: Any items that have their status attribute set to 'production' and have their os_family attribute set to 'Windows XP', 'Windows Vista', Windows 7' or 'Windows 8'.
